segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a slice of everyday life gone awry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her apron focuses solely on the dish in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the faucet blasting water into the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's brimming over, flooding the counter and floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot dips into the puddle without a second thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her; she'll be so upset when she notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy scales the stool with determination toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is long, fingers dipping into the treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool is leaning back perilously far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl aids him by waiting with open hand nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret snack time is adorable yet reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets drip with water, and dishes could shatter if anyone falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a peaceful garden scene outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how calm it all looks from afar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
